word: H2654 - חָפֵץ - châphêts - khaw-fates' - [idiom] any at all - ஏதாவது

sections.paragraph: சுருக்க விளக்கம் / Short Definition: [idiom] any at all / ஏதாவது
வினைச்சொல் - பிரியம் வைத்திரு, பிரியமாயிரு, விரும்பு, சித்தமாயிரு, நீட்டு, மனதாகு
(1) to delight in, to take pleasure in, to desire, to be pleased with
1) to take pleasure in, to delight in
2) to delight, to desire, to be pleased to do
1) to delight in, to have pleasure in

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to incline to; by implication (literally but rarely) to bend; figuratively to be pleased with, desire: - X any at all, (have, take) delight, desire, favour, like, move, be (well) pleased, have pleasure, will, would.
Cognate: H2654, H2655, H2656, H2657
